{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = MikroTik R11e-2HnD.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 2.4Ghz 802.11b/g/n 800mW mini PCI-e card |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mikrotik.com/product/R11e-2HnD |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = MikroTik_R11e-2HnD |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = MikroTik |model = R11e-2H |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = nD |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/17/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/MikroTik_R11e-2HnD |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0033 |subvendor_id = 19b6 |subdevice_id = d010 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TV7R11E2HPND |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 4C:5E:0C
|chip1 = Atheros;AR9582; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = high power, heatsink |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/26/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = 39 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B016ITBEC4 |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The FCC ID on the label is ''TV7R11E2HPND'', the same :FCC ID used by the [[MikroTik R11e-2HPnD]].
==Links of Interest== [[MikroTik]]'s [https://i.mt.lv/routerboard/files/R11-160330120340.pdf spec. sheet] notes the chipset as AR9582.
*[https://eko.one.pl/forum/viewtopic.php?id=16402 ''iwinfo'' on '''eko.one.pl''' forums] (OUI: 4C:5E:0C) :[[MikroTik R11e-2HnD]] (168c:0033/19b6:d010) :[[MikroTik R11e-2HPnD]] (168c:0033/19b6:d016) :[[MikroTik R11e-5HnD]] (168c:0033/19b6:d057) :[[MikroTik R11e-5HacT]] (168c:003c/19b6:d03c) :[[MikroTik R11e-5HacD]] (168c:003c/19b6:d042)
